00058 vec2st::vec2st() : Iop() 
00059 {
00061         inputs( 1 );

00064         flipS = false;
00065         flipT = false;

00069 void vec2st::knobs(Knob_Callback f)

00073         Bool_knob( f, &flipT, "Flip t" );

00084 void vec2st::_validate(bool for_real)
00085 {
00086         copy_info();
00087 
00088         set_out_channels( Mask_All );
00089         Format temp = info_.format();
00090         width = temp.width();
00091         info_.set( info_.x(), info_.y(), info_.r(), info_.t() );
00092 }

00094 void vec2st::_request(int x,int y,int r,int t, ChannelMask channels, int count)
00095 {
00096         input0().request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00097 }

00099 void vec2st::engine(int y, int x, int r, ChannelMask channels, Row& out)
00100 {
00102         out.range( 0, width );
00104         Row in1(x, r);
00105 
00106         input0().get(y, x, r, channels, in1);
00108         foreach (z, channels) 
00109         {
00111                 float* outPixelsR = out.writable(Chan_Red);
00112                 float* outPixelsG = out.writable(Chan_Green);
00113                 float* outPixelsB = out.writable(Chan_Blue);
00114 
00116                 for (int index = x; index < r; index++ ) 
00117                 {
00119                         Vector inVec( in1[Chan_Red][index], in1[Chan_Green][index],in1[Chan_Blue][index] );
00121                         if ( inVec.length() > 0.0001f )
00122                         {
00123                                 float s;
00124                                 float t;
00126                                 if ( flip )
00127                                 {
00128                                         t = (float)acos( inVec.y ) / (float)M_PI;
00129                                         s = ( (float)M_PI + (float)atan2( (double)inVec.z, (double)inVec.x ) ) / ( 2 * (float)M_PI ); 
00131                                 } else
00132                                 {
00133                                         s = (float)acos( inVec.y ) / (float)M_PI;
00134                                         t = ( (float)M_PI + (float)atan2( (double)inVec.z, (double)inVec.x ) ) / ( 2 * (float)M_PI ); 
00135                                 }
00137                                 if ( flipS )
00138                                 {
00139                                         s = s*-1 + 1;
00140                                 }
00141 
00142                                 if ( flipT )
00143                                 {
00144                                         t = t*-1 + 1;
00145                                 }
00147                                 outPixelsR[index] = s;
00148                                 outPixelsG[index] = t;
00149                                 outPixelsB[index] = 0.0f;
00150                         } else
00151                         {
00152                                 outPixelsR[index] = 0.0f;
00153                                 outPixelsG[index] = 0.0f;
00154                                 outPixelsB[index] = 0.0f;
00155                         }
00156                         
00157                         
00158                 }
00159                 
00160         }
00161 }
